programme.desc: The 2025 FIFA U-20 World Cup will be held in Chile from 27 September to 19 October 2025. The Tournament features 24 National Teams from 6 confederations. All the games are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. Liverpool are winless in their last four Premier League games at Stamford Bridge and could lose away to Chelsea two seasons running in the league for the first time since losing three on the bounce from 2004-05 to 2006-07.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United have lost just two of their last 30 league games against Sunderland, with this their first since a 3-0 win in April 2017. Across all competitions, Sunderland have managed to win just one of their last 31 away games against Manchester United, winning 1-0 in May 2014 thanks to Sebastian Larsson’s winner.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match

programme.title: Arsenal vs West Ham United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have lost both of their last two home league games against West Ham, only ever losing three in a row once before. West Ham United are looking to become only the second side to win three successive Premier League away games against Arsenal, after Manchester City, who won six on the bounce from March 2018 to February 2023.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sevilla have not won any of their last 19 LaLiga games against Barcelona, a run that stretches back to October 2015, losing their last seven in a row – their longest consecutive losing streak against the Catalans in the top-flight. Barcelona have avoided defeat in their last nine away LaLiga matches against Sevilla, their longest unbeaten run away to them in the competition.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. Liverpool are winless in their last four Premier League games at Stamford Bridge and could lose away to Chelsea two seasons running in the league for the first time since losing three on the bounce from 2004-05 to 2006-07.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. programme.title: Lille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Lille have won just one of their last 13 home Ligue 1 games against Paris SG, a 5-1 victory on 14 April 2019, which remains Paris Saint-Germain's biggest away defeat in the top-flight in the 21st century. Lille have lost their last two Ligue 1 matches and could suffer three consecutive defeats in the competition for the first time since December 2019-January 2020. Lille could also fail to score in three consecutive Ligue 1 games for the first time since September 2017.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. Liverpool are winless in their last four Premier League games at Stamford Bridge and could lose away to Chelsea two seasons running in the league for the first time since losing three on the bounce from 2004-05 to 2006-07.

programme.title: Panenka: Game Changer | E1
programme.desc: A documentary about Antonin Panenka, the man who invented a new way of taking penalties.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Salah
programme.desc: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 - Mini Match
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sevilla have not won any of their last 19 LaLiga games against Barcelona, a run that stretches back to October 2015, losing their last seven in a row – their longest consecutive losing streak against the Catalans in the top-flight. Barcelona have avoided defeat in their last nine away LaLiga matches against Sevilla, their longest unbeaten run away to them in the competition.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Lille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Lille have won just one of their last 13 home Ligue 1 games against Paris SG, a 5-1 victory on 14 April 2019, which remains Paris Saint-Germain's biggest away defeat in the top-flight in the 21st century. Lille have lost their last two Ligue 1 matches and could suffer three consecutive defeats in the competition for the first time since December 2019-January 2020. Lille could also fail to score in three consecutive Ligue 1 games for the first time since September 2017.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Since completing a Premier League double over Manchester City in 2022-23, Brentford are winless in their last four against the Citizens in the division. Manchester City have only lost one of their four Premier League visits to Brentford, going down 1-0 on the final day of the 2022-23 season.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. Liverpool are winless in their last four Premier League games at Stamford Bridge and could lose away to Chelsea two seasons running in the league for the first time since losing three on the bounce from 2004-05 to 2006-07.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Sunderland - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United have lost just two of their last 30 league games against Sunderland, with this their first since a 3-0 win in April 2017. Across all competitions, Sunderland have managed to win just one of their last 31 away games against Manchester United, winning 1-0 in May 2014 thanks to Sebastian Larsson’s winner.

programme.title: Chelsea vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2 - Mini Match
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.desc: Green Bay Packers @ Dallas Cowboys, from AT&T Stadium

programme.title: Sevilla vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sevilla have not won any of their last 19 LaLiga games against Barcelona, a run that stretches back to October 2015, losing their last seven in a row – their longest consecutive losing streak against the Catalans in the top-flight. Barcelona have avoided defeat in their last nine away LaLiga matches against Sevilla, their longest unbeaten run away to them in the competition.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Lille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Lille have won just one of their last 13 home Ligue 1 games against Paris SG, a 5-1 victory on 14 April 2019, which remains Paris Saint-Germain's biggest away defeat in the top-flight in the 21st century. Lille have lost their last two Ligue 1 matches and could suffer three consecutive defeats in the competition for the first time since December 2019-January 2020. Lille could also fail to score in three consecutive Ligue 1 games for the first time since September 2017.

programme.desc: Manchester United have lost just two of their last 30 league games against Sunderland, with this their first since a 3-0 win in April 2017. programme.title: Ligue 1 Weekly Review - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Each Ligue 1 Match week is condensed into a 52-minute highlights show. Every game, goal, penalty, red card and everything in between is squeezed into an action-packed hour to ensure no football fan misses a kick across the game season.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Sevilla have not won any of their last 19 LaLiga games against Barcelona, a run that stretches back to October 2015, losing their last seven in a row – their longest consecutive losing streak against the Catalans in the top-flight. Barcelona have avoided defeat in their last nine away LaLiga matches against Sevilla, their longest unbeaten run away to them in the competition.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Villarreal -Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Madrid have not lost any of their last four LaLiga games against Villarreal, winning the last two, this after failing to win any of their previous four against the Yellows in the competition. They have not won three or more in a row against them in LaLiga since 2011. Villarreal have lost 17 of their 25 LaLiga away matches against Real Madrid, their highest number of away defeats against a single opponent in the competition.

programme.title: Lille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Lille have won just one of their last 13 home Ligue 1 games against Paris SG, a 5-1 victory on 14 April 2019, which remains Paris Saint-Germain's biggest away defeat in the top-flight in the 21st century. Lille have lost their last two Ligue 1 matches and could suffer three consecutive defeats in the competition for the first time since December 2019-January 2020. Lille could also fail to score in three consecutive Ligue 1 games for the first time since September 2017.

programme.title: UEFA UCL Magazine 2025/2026 - MD2 Review
programme.desc: A recap of the best of the action, plus a look forward to the next Match Day in Europe’s premium football competition, the UEFA Champions League. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. All matches from the UEFA Champions League are live and exclusive only on beIN with a choice of Arabic or English commentary.

programme.title: Brentford vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Since completing a Premier League double over Manchester City in 2022-23, Brentford are winless in their last four against the Citizens in the division. Manchester City have only lost one of their four Premier League visits to Brentford, going down 1-0 on the final day of the 2022-23 season.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Liverpool -English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After their 3-1 win in May, Chelsea could enjoy back-to-back league wins over Liverpool for the first time since November 2014. Liverpool are winless in their last four Premier League games at Stamford Bridge and could lose away to Chelsea two seasons running in the league for the first time since losing three on the bounce from 2004-05 to 2006-07.

programme.desc: Everton have lost just one of their last 21 Premier League meetings with Crystal Palace, a 1-3 defeat in December 2021. The winners of each group will qualify directly for the 2026 FIFA World Cup, while the runners-up will advance to the fifth round.

programme.title: Lille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 7
programme.desc: Lille have won just one of their last 13 home Ligue 1 games against Paris SG, a 5-1 victory on 14 April 2019, which remains Paris Saint-Germain's biggest away defeat in the top-flight in the 21st century. Lille have lost their last two Ligue 1 matches and could suffer three consecutive defeats in the competition for the first time since December 2019-January 2020. Lille could also fail to score in three consecutive Ligue 1 games for the first time since September 2017.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M
programme.desc: This will be the first-ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Melbourne City and Sanfrecce Hiroshima; City are winless in each of their two games against Japanese opposition in the competition, while a win for Sanfrecce would see them beat Australian opponents in three consecutive games for the first time in competition history. Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Melbourne City FC (AUS) vs Sanfrecce Hiroshima (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East M

Melbourne City are winless in each of their last three matches in the AFC Champions League Elite, their longest such run in the competition; in fact, they have begun each of their previous two campaigns in the competition with draws.

programme.title: Gangwon FC (KOR) vs Shanghai Shenhua FC (CHN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Gangwon and Shanghai Shenhua, with the former set to play their first-ever game in the competition; Shenhua have lost each of their last two matches against South Korean opposition in the Champions League Elite, another defeat here will see them equal their longest such run in competition history. Shanghai Shenhua lost their most recent AFC Champions League Elite match 0-4 to Kawasaki Frontale on 12 March 2025; failure to score against Gangwon will see them go scoreless in consecutive games for the first time in the competition since May 2011.

programme.title: Al Ahli Saudi FC (KSA) vs PFC Nasaf (UZB) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al-Ahli and Nasaf, with Nasaf’s only win coming in their most recent such game on 2 March 2016 ; Al-Ahli’s most recent game in the competition against Uzbek opposition was a 2-1 win over Pakhtakor Tashkent on 20 May 2019, a win here will see them win two consecutive such games for the first time in competition history. Al-Ahli are unbeaten in each of their last 18 AFC Champions League Elite games, including the final of the 2024-25 edition ; avoiding defeat here will see them equal Gamba Osaka for the joint third-longest such run in the competition.

programme.title: FC Seoul (KOR) vs Buriram United (THA) -AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD2
programme.desc: FC Seoul are unbeaten in each of their four meetings against Buriram United in the AFC Champions League Elite, including wins in each of their last two; in fact, FC Seoul have lost just one of their six meetings against Thai sides in the competition, with the loss coming in their most recent such game. Buriram United are unbeaten in each of their last five games in the AFC Champions League Elite against sides from South Korea ; their last loss against such a side came in May 2018.

programme.title: Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) vs FC Machida Zelvia (JPN) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East
programme.desc: Johor Darul Ta’zim will be playing against Machida Zelvia for the first time in AFC Champions League history; Johor Darul Ta’zim are winless in their last seven games in the competition against teams from Japan, failing to score in each of the last five of these games. Machida Zelvia are the fifth Japanese club to start their debut AFC Champions League Elite campaign with a draw ; the last two such participants gained at least one point in their second game.

programme.title: FC Viktoria Plzeň vs Malmö FF - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD2
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Benfica - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: Chelsea have won all four of their competitive meetings with Benfica, with the most recent of those coming earlier this year at the FIFA Club World Cup. This will be the first meeting between Chelsea and Benfica in the group/league phase of a competition, with the previous four all having come in the knockout stages: UEFA Champions League quarter-finals in 2011-12, UEFA Europa League final in 2012-13 and the FIFA Club World Cup last 16 earlier this year.

programme.title: Napoli vs Sporting Clube de Portugal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD2
programme.desc: The two previous meetings between Napoli and Sporting CP have both finished 0-0, with both coming in the first round of the 1989-90 UEFA Cup first round. Napoli have won all four of their UEFA Champions League matches against Portuguese sides, beating Benfica twice in 2016-17 and Braga twice in 2023-24.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Brighton & Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 8
programme.desc: Wolves have won just two of their 14 Premier League games against Brighton and are winless in their last seven since a 1-0 triumph in December 2021 under Bruno Lage. programme.title: Arturo Coello (ESP) / Agustin Tapia (ARG) vs Federico Chingotto (ARG) / Alejandro Galan (ESP) - Men
programme.desc: Top seeds Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia clash with No.2 Alejandro Galán/Federico Chingotto. Coello/Tapia dominated most of 2025, but Galán/Chingotto struck back with victory in Germany P2. Head-to-head favors Coello/Tapia, yet momentum is split after recent meetings. Indoor conditions at Rotterdam Ahoy amplify aggressive volleys and x-3 smashes, setting up a high-stakes P1 decider.

programme.title: Arturo Coello (ESP) / Agustin Tapia (ARG) vs Federico Chingotto (ARG) / Alejandro Galan (ESP) - Men
programme.desc: Top seeds Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia clash with No.2 Alejandro Galán/Federico Chingotto. Coello/Tapia dominated most of 2025, but Galán/Chingotto struck back with victory in Germany P2. Head-to-head favors Coello/Tapia, yet momentum is split after recent meetings. Indoor conditions at Rotterdam Ahoy amplify aggressive volleys and x-3 smashes, setting up a high-stakes P1 decider.

programme.title: Delfina Brea Senesi (ARG) / Gemma Triay Pons (ESP) vs Ariana Sanchez Fallada (ESP) / Paula Josemari
programme.desc: World No.1 pairing Gemma Triay/Delfina Brea face No.2 Ariana Sánchez/Paula Josemaría at Rotterdam Ahoy. A classic rivalry: Triay/Brea lead the season with multiple titles, including Germany P2 last week, while Sánchez/Josemaría chase revenge after losing six of seven meetings this year. Expect sharp returns, low volleys, and golden-point pressure in a battle for supremacy.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

Cesson-Rennes vs Montpellier - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring Part 1
programme.desc: DTM. The embodiment of Motorsport tradition. Having just turned 40, the DTM combines a unique fascination and familiarity with an unmistakable dynamic, signified by the rebranding with a new logo! Seven different manufacturers – ten different winners on six brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) through twelve races are but one testament to the unique competitive balance that makes every DTM weekend a revelation! And with the addition of Ford, the palette of different brands is only increasing!

programme.title: DTM Show 2025-Red Bull Ring Part 2
programme.desc: DTM. The embodiment of Motorsport tradition. Having just turned 40, the DTM combines a unique fascination and familiarity with an unmistakable dynamic, signified by the rebranding with a new logo! Seven different manufacturers – ten different winners on six brands (Audi, BMW, Mercedes, Lamborghini, Porsche and Ferrari) through twelve races are but one testament to the unique competitive balance that makes every DTM weekend a revelation! And with the addition of Ford, the palette of different brands is only increasing!
